name: tm79
effect: Teaches Dark Pulse to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Frost Breath to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Dark Pulse)

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.platinum: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.
